discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
HR Fundamentals ebook page 17

questions.question_text: If you wanted someone to administer the Employee Service Center without granting them the HR Admin role, which scoped Admin role would they need?

choices.B: When an HR Profile is created or modified for the employee
choices.C: Client Roles are automatically added with Group membership
choices.A: Client Roles must be manually added to each employee record
choices.D: When a User record is created for the employee

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
HR Fundamentals ebook page 53: When an HR Profile is created and the Employment start date and Employment type fields are completed, the system automatically assigns the employee a Client Role.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-employee-service-management/page/product/human-resources/task/t_ClientRoleAssignRules.html

questions.question_text: When does the platform assign a Client Role to a user?
If you had little coding experience and were tasked with adding new pages to the customer’s Employee Service Center, which Service Portal Configuration option would be best to complete the task?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
To create and layout pages we use Designer, to configure the properties of pages, containers and widgets from a map view we use Page Editor, to create widgets from scratch or customize an existing one we use Widget Editor

Selected Answer: B
b is correct
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/tokyo-servicenow-platform/page/build/service-portal/task/t_ConfigureAPage.html

Selected Answer: B
Designer is low code option … B is answer

questions.question_text: What provides a graphical interface to create survey categories, questions, configure the details, and publish the survey?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
HR Implementation ebook page 185: Employee forms are questionnaires built using the survey designer.
cant see those buttons in dashboard
